Source.Name: openclipart
Source.Description: Open Clip Art Gallery contains thousand of PNG images that can be freely used.

Update.Comment: Since OpenOffice is able to use PNG files only, switching to png-only tarball (converted from upstream svg's using inkscape and optimized with optipng) which is copied from SuSE openclipart srpm. We shouldn't use 0.18-full tarball from upstream because png's are very small in there. And cliparts from upstream tarballs after 0.18 are not categorized in directory structure so we stuck at 0.18 like other distros.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan
